name: Loopdedoo DIY Friendship Bracelet Maker Kit for Kids - Make Bracelets in Minutes for Birthdays and Friendship Gifts - Award Winning Crafts Kit for Kids, Easy-to-Use, Loop Your Own Style, Aged 8+
short_description: Modern twist on friendship bracelets: Introducing the bracelet making kit, a contemporary take on the classic friendship bracelet. With its patented spinning loom and portable design, create trendy and personalized accessories that stand out.

Quick and effortless crafting: Crafting friendship bracelets has never been more enjoyable and convenient. The Loopdedoo friendship bracelet making kit streamlines the process, allowing you to effortlessly craft bracelets in a matter of minutes, transforming your creativity into wearable art.

Uniquely personalized creations: Ignite your imagination and design flair with the Loopdedoo. You can customize every bracelet with 18 color combinations by making variations in thickness, looping style, thread quantity, and color combinations.

Suitable for ages 8 and up: The perfect present for kids, tweens, and teens! Foster creativity and self-expression by gifting the Loopdedoo bracelets making kit. Inspire young minds to create, experiment, and share their artistic visions.

Comprehensive arts and crafts experience: Unleash your creativity with our award winning Loopdedoo bracelet kit, which includes the innovative spinning loom featuring a secret storage drawer. Alongside, you'll find 12 skeins of premium 100% cotton embroidery thread.
product_description: Product Description Step into a world of creativity and self-expression with the Loopdedoo friendship bracelet making kit! This innovative DIY bracelet making kit reimagines the traditional art of friendship bracelets, offering a modern twist through its patented spinning loom and portable design. Features: - Modernized friendship bracelets with a spin: Discover the magic of the Loopdedoo patented spinning loom, transforming the art of friendship bracelets into an engaging and contemporary crafting experience. - Effortless bracelet crafting in minutes: Crafting doesn't have to be time-consuming. With the Loopdedoo bracelet maker, making your own friendship bracelets becomes quick and enjoyable, allowing you to create stunning accessories in just minutes. - Craft one-of-a-kind accessories: You can make a total of 18 color combinations with it. Adjust the thickness, looping style, thread quantity, and color combinations to design unique bracelets that showcase your personal style. - Comprehensive crafting kit: Unbox creativity with the complete Loopdedoo friendship bracelet kit, featuring the spinning loom with a hidden storage drawer. The Loopdedoo friendship bracelet maker includes 12 skeins of premium 100% cotton embroidery thread, empowering you to craft to your heart's content. - Portability for on-the-go fun: Take your creative endeavors wherever you go. The Loopdedoo's travel-ready design ensures that you can create stylish bracelets anytime, anywhere. - Award-winning craft kit: The Loopdedoo has earned accolades for its innovative approach, making it an award-winning choice for aspiring artisans and craft enthusiasts. The Loopdedoo DIY friendship bracelet maker kit opens a gateway to artistic exploration and endless fun. With its modernized design, quick crafting process, and personalized creations, it's a must-have for those seeking both entertainment and self-expression. From the Manufacturer Loopdedoo is a new spining tool that makes fabulous twisted accessories called Loopdies. Loopdies are colorful accessories that you design with embroidery floss and spin with the Loopdedoo. It's fast, easy and fun. You can make a friendship bracelet in just a few minutes. And you can make necklaces, anklets, belts and more. The great thing about Loopdies (besides taking only minutes to make) is that there's never a pattern to follow so each accessory is completely different and unique, just like you and your friends. You can use one thread or as many threads and color combinations as you like. You can make them thick, thin or anywere in between. You can use different looping styles and even combine them into one accessory. Each Loopdie is your own unique design. Make fab and funky twisted friendship bracelets in minutes, or make them with friends for hours.
